page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: Mr. Baker of Ribble Bus Services provided the following:- 10 bus routes regularly service the Maghull area: 32l, 3ll,3l0, 302, 101, 340, 300,350,34l and 228. Also 351 and 211. All of the buses in the Aintree depot are red. l40 men are employed at the depot (it requires 8 men to keep a bus operational, e.g. drivers, mechanics, cleaners, etc) Every year lOO new buses are order for Â£100,000 each. They are made mainly of fibreglass and aluminium and have a working life of l5 years. After that time they are either scrapped or sold to countries that cannot afford new vehicles. Petrol consumption is approx. 9 miles per gallon. Nobody has been killed by a Ribble bus since l957 and the most common destination is Liverpool.
